title: "Auf der Alm da gibt's koa SÃ¼nd" - Die Erotikfilme der 1960er, -70er und -80er Jahre
overview: In the 1960s, the film production company Lisa Film, headed by Karl Spiehs, ushered in a new era in German film: the erotic film. This period, characterized by change and openness, produced numerous successful films that had a lasting impact on the genre in Germany and captivated audiences.
